Creating Conducive Learning
Spaces for Marginalized
Communities


We aim to prevent and eradicate poverty from its root in Nigeria,
particularly in Northern Nigeria.


Join Us →

About Us


Learn More →

Founded in 2007, BMCCI is a non-profit organization dedicated to
tackling poverty at its source. With a focus on Northern Nigeria,
we empower communities through educational and economic support,
helping individuals and families to thrive.

Registered as a social enterprise in 2013 and as a non-governmental organization in 2017,
we’ve built a foundation rooted in community support, economic development,
and advocacy for marginalized groups.

Interventions

BMCCI's support for vulnerable communities


At BMCCI, we believe in uplifting the most vulnerable members of
our society—widows and orphans—by addressing their immediate
needs and empowering them for a sustainable future.

Our intervention program focuses on providing essential food
supplies to ensure no one goes hungry. We recognize that widows
and orphans often face economic hardships, so we also support
their aspirations by offering financial literacy training. This equips
them with the skills to effectively manage resources and grow
their small businesses.

Additionally, BMCCI extends non-interest loans and small
stipends to kickstart or scale their enterprises, enabling financial
independence and long-term stability. By bridging the gap
between immediate relief and economic empowerment, BMCCI is
fostering resilience and hope within our communities.

Together, we are creating pathways to a brighter and more inclusive future for all.

Success Stories from Our
Partners


Our partners make a tangible impact on the lives of those
we serve. Read stories from our partners about their
journey with BMCCI, the successes they ve witnessed, and
the communities transformed through our shared efforts.

Our Partners

Our customers accomplish amazing things every day. They work to find cures to cancer, travel to space, build tomorrow's innovations, and beyond.
